title: What's Up With My Honor?
body:
I've played 100+ games since my honor got unlocked (not after the ban, since it got UNLOCKED). I also have been getting honors from others pretty frequently, and I haven't been toxic or anything. Why aren't I level 1 yet? Am I close?
Thanks! 
-Rynojos

replies.body: I went ahead and checked out your recent honor history, and it does look like you've been steadily gaining honor exp towards getting back to rank 1. You aren't quite there yet, but those honors have been getting applied.
